Inc.","details":"Can be configured with different holding periods per token      Use cases:      - Rule 144 holding periods (6/12 months)      - Reg S holding periods (1 year)      - Custom founder lockups      - Post-IPO lockups      - Any time-based transfer restriction      Unlike LockupComplianceModule (which is lot-specific and simpler),      this module tracks per-holder-per-lot acquisition dates and applies      a configurable holding period.
